channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- Advanced Threat Defense (ATD)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- Advanced Threat Defense (ATD)

item.title: CVE-2017-4057|2024-09-17T00:11:36.953Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD) 3.10, 3.8, 3.6, 3.4 allows remote authenticated users to gain elevated privileges via the GUI or GUI terminal commands.

item.title: CVE-2017-4055|2024-09-17T03:52:48.514Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Exploitation of Authentication vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD) 3.10, 3.8, 3.6, 3.4 allows remote unauthenticated users / remote attackers to bypass ATD detection via loose enforcement of authentication and authorization.
